drone_goals.description: Investigate mineral composition in rocky terrain near nodes N14 and N27.
Perform high-resolution aerial imaging of crater terrain at node N66.
Monitor atmospheric dust density in sandy terrain at node N18.

constraints: Drones are required to complete all flights within their maximum operational range.
No autonomous vehicle may enter regions marked as geologically unstable or environmentally hazardous.
hazards: Node N58: persistent dust storm activity
